duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and develop national sales opportunities for LED Video Displays under the DVS LED brand.
Cultivate curated solutions with existing and newly identified clients according to project requirements.
Assist with selection of products, system requirements, and service/labor specifications in coordination with Project Management and Systems Engineering.
Prepare responses to requests for proposals in collaboration with Technical Product Managers and Project Management.
Negotiate favorable contract terms and pricing/margins with clients.
Coordinate company technical and service resources to accommodate client needs.
Provide internal and external support and customer service from initial contact to beyond the sale.
Participate in collection efforts for unpaid invoices.
Travel to client sites as point of contact to scope out projects.
Demonstrate products to clients on-site or in-showroom.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
